posts.title: This is Sapper!
posts.summary: This static blog site has been migrated from Nikola to Sapper. In this article we will go through the main reasons, performance results and some other thoughts about using Sapper and Svelte for generate an static web site
posts.author: Carlos Martin Sanchez
